properties.label: Now, I would like to ask you few questions about birth details

properties.name: birthWeight
properties.label: What was the baby’s weight at birth?

properties.name: sizeCompareOtherChild
properties.label: Compared to other children in your area, what was the child's size at birth?

properties.name: pregDuration
properties.label: How long was the pregnancy when the baby was born? (Months)

properties.name: ageFatalIllnessDays
properties.label: How old was the baby/child when the fatal illness started? (Days)

properties.name: ageFatalIllness
properties.label: How old was the baby/child when the fatal illness started?

properties.name: ageFatalIllness
properties.label: How old was the baby/child when the fatal illness started?

properties.name: singleMultiple
properties.label: Was the baby/child a singleton or multiple birth?

properties.name: childBornLocation
properties.label: Where was the baby born?

properties.name: otherChildBornLocation
properties.label: Specify the place of birth

properties.name: deliveryAttended
properties.label: Who attended the delivery?

properties.name: otherDeliveryAttended
properties.label: Specify who attended the delivery

properties.name: complications
properties.label: Was there any complication during labour, delivery, or the last 3 months of pregnancy when pregnant with this baby/child?

properties.name: abnormalPhysPart
properties.label: Was any part of the baby physically abnormal at time of delivery? (for example: body part too large or too small, additional growth on body)

properties.name: abnormalities
properties.label: What were the abnormalities?

items.text: Head size very small at time of birth
items.value: Head size very small at time of birth

items.text: Head size very large at time of birth
items.value: Head size very large at time of birth

items.text: Mass or defect on the back of head or spine
items.value: Mass or defect on the back of head or spine

properties.name: otherAbnormalities
properties.label: Specify the abnormalities.

properties.name: blueColor
properties.label: Was the baby blue in colour at birth?

properties.name: everCry
properties.label: Did the baby ever cry after birth, even if only a little bit?

properties.name: everMove
properties.label: Did the baby ever move after birth?

properties.name: everBreathe
properties.label: Did the baby ever breathe after birth?

properties.name: durationCryBreatheAfterBirth
properties.label: How long after birth did the baby first cry or breath?

properties.name: stopCry
properties.label: Did the baby stop being able to cry?

properties.name: durationStopCryBeforeDeath
properties.label: How long before the baby died did the baby stop crying?

properties.name: bodyInjury
properties.label: Were there any bruises or signs of injury on the baby/child's body after the birth?

properties.name: convulsionsFirstDay
properties.label: Did the baby have convulsions starting within the first day of life?

properties.name: convulsionsSecondDay
properties.label: Did the baby have convulsions starting on the second day or later after birth?
Now, I will ask you a few details regarding suckling

properties.name: firstDaySuckle
properties.label: Was the baby able to suckle or bottle-feed normally during the first day after birth?

properties.name: everSuckle
properties.label: Did the baby ever suckle in a normal way?

properties.name: stopSuckle
properties.label: Did the baby stop being able to suckle in a normal way?

properties.name: durationStopSuckleBeforeDeath
properties.label: How long before the death did the baby stop suckling?

properties.name: openMouth
properties.label: Was the baby able to open the mouth at the time s/he stopped sucking?
In continuation with the above details, I will ask you a few questions specific to your delivery

properties.name: hbp
properties.label: During pregnancy, did you/the baby's mother suffer from high blood pressure?

properties.name: convultion
properties.label: Did you/the baby's mother have convulsions during last 3 months of pregnancy, or during labour, or delivery?

properties.name: anemia
properties.label: Did you/the baby's mother have severe anemia during the last 3 months of pregnancy, labour or delivery?

properties.name: diabetes
properties.label: Did you/the baby's mother have diabetes during the last 3 months of pregnancy, labour or delivery?

properties.name: hiv
properties.label: Did the mother ever test positive for HIV?

properties.name: abnormalPosition
properties.label: Did the baby's bottom, feet, arm or hand come out of the vagina before its head?

properties.name: umbilicalCordWrapped
properties.label: Was the umbilical cord wrapped several times (more than once) around the child's neck at birth?

properties.name: vaginalBleeding
properties.label: Did you/the baby's mother have excessive vaginal bleeding during labour or delivery?

properties.name: fever
properties.label: Did you/the baby's mother have fever during labour?

properties.name: movingStopped
properties.label: Did the baby stop moving in the womb before labour started?

properties.name: childLastMove
properties.label: When did you/the baby's mother last feel the baby move before delivery?(Enter in Hours/Days)

properties.name: waterBreak
properties.label: Did the water break before labor or during labor?

properties.name: timeWaterBreak
properties.label: How much time before labor did the water bag break?

properties.name: liquidColor
properties.label: What was the color of the liquid (amniotic fluid) when the water bag broke?

properties.name: otherLiquidColor
properties.label: Specify the color of liquid (amniotic fluid).

properties.name: liquidFoulSmell
properties.label: Did the liquid (amnotic fluid) have a foul smell?

properties.name: timeLaborDelivery
properties.label: How much time did the labor and delivery take(hours)?

properties.name: deliveryMode
properties.label: What was the mode of delivery?

items.text: Vaginal Don't know (whether forceps or vaccume used)
items.value: Vaginal Dont know (whether forceps or vaccume used)

properties.name: caesareanDecision
properties.label: When was the decision made for you/the baby's mother to have a Caesarean section?

properties.name: motherAlive
properties.label: Is the mother still alive?

properties.name: motherDeath
properties.label: Did the mother die during or after the delivery?

properties.name: durationMotherDeath
properties.label: How long after the delivery did the mother die?
